query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(dba_start_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS business_count, naic_code, ownership_name, neighborhoods_analysis_boundaries WHERE dba_start_date>='2022-09-01' GROUP BY naic_code, ownership_name, neighborhoods_analysis_boundaries, month ORDER BY month, naic_code, ownership_name, neighborhoods_analysis_boundaries

column_metadata.description: Month of the business start date
North American Industry Classification System code
The Analysis Neighborhood in which the business location falls

table_metadata.title: Registered Business Locations - San Francisco
table_metadata.description: Locations of businesses that pay taxes to the City and County of San Francisco. Each location is recorded in a row, with data collected to enforce the Business and Tax Regulations Code.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Economists, business analysts, city planners, tax authorities

whom_it_may_interest: Economists, business analysts, city planners, tax authorities
title: Registered Business Locations - San Francisco
